hooks.command: for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do case "$f" in *.env|*.env.*|*auth.json|*credentials*|*secrets*) echo 'BLOCKED: Refusing to edit sensitive file: '"$f" >&2; exit 2;; esac; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$f" == *.tsx ]]; then cd tauri-app && npx prettier --write "$f" 2>/dev/null; fi; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" == *.rs ]]; then cd tauri-app/src-tauri && cargo fmt 2>/dev/null; fi; done
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if [[ "$f" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$f" == *.tsx ]]; then cd tauri-app && npx eslint "$f" --max-warnings 0 2>/dev/null; fi; done
